author: jstrachan
msg: patched the versions of jars Maven uses.
* used the latest dom4j to fix i18n issues
* used latest commons-collections 2.1 release so we can start deprecating the old iterators stuff
* used the proper 1.0.b2 xml-apis.jar rather than the deprecated 2.0.x versions.
